remarks: The domain and range of the function ` F ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
statement:
qlift.1 $e |- F = ran ( x e. X |-> <. [ x ] R , A >. ) $.
qlift.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. Y ) $.
qlift.3 $e |- ( ph -> R Er X ) $.
qlift.4 $e |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) $.
qliftf $p |- ( ph -> ( Fun F <-> F : ( X /. R ) --> Y ) ) $.
$d R x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
